gen:link.msg:message: `GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationAssimilation` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `po`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationAssimilation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesGovernmentContributionsAndSubsidiesOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_GovernmentContributionCommunityParticipationAssimilation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
